one of my most favorite films,its the story of a free spirited woman and what a free spirited woman has to face just because she had choices and she did not act as the society believes a woman should...for me zubeidaa at least tried to live a life of her choice ..no matter what it led to..lovely character ...always brings tears to my eyes...must watch movie!!

i don't understand why didnt karisma get national award or any award which is bigger than national film award??? anyways karisma's work in the movie is like a sky nobody can touch it nor reach it!! all the awards goes sink in front of her work!!!
